get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images](/reference#list-images) endpoint instead. Lists all containers.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

200.description: Returns an array of containers.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images](/reference#container-security-v2-list-images) endpoint instead. Returns an inventory of an image by ID.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the image that you want to inventory.
parameters.name: imageID

200.description: Returns the inventory of the image you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

post.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. For images import, use Tenable.io connectors. For more information, see [Tenable.io Vulnerability Management User Guide](https://docs.tenable.com/cloud/containersecurity/Content/ContainerSecurity/ConfigureConnectors.htm). Creates an import.

Requires STANDARD [32] user permissions. See Permissions.

200.description: Returns the ID you specified in the request.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. For images import, use Tenable.io connectors. For more information, see [Tenable.io Vulnerability Management User Guide](https://docs.tenable.com/cloud/containersecurity/Content/ContainerSecurity/ConfigureConnectors.htm). Returns a list of all imports.

Requires STANDARD [32] user permissions. See Permissions.

200.description: Returns an array of information about each import that has been performed.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:

For more information, see [Tenable.io Vulnerability Management User Guide](https://docs.tenable.com/cloud/containersecurity/Content/ContainerSecurity/ConfigureConnectors.htm). Updates an import by ID.

For more information, see [Tenable.io Vulnerability Management User Guide](https://docs.tenable.com/cloud/containersecurity/Content/ContainerSecurity/ConfigureConnectors.htm). Runs an import by ID.

200.description: Returns the ID of the import you want to run.

post.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. For images import, use Tenable.io connectors. For more information, see [Tenable.io Vulnerability Management User Guide](https://docs.tenable.com/cloud/containersecurity/Content/ContainerSecurity/ConfigureConnectors.htm). Tests your connection to Tenable.io Container Security.

Requires STANDARD [32] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: A test ID. You can specify any integer as the ID. Tenable.io Container Security uses this value for the test only.
parameters.name: id

200.description: Returns the ID you specified in the request.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. To determine the progress of an image analysis, use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint in Tenable.io Container Security API v2. Returns a list of active jobs.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

200.description: Returns an array of the statuses of all active jobs.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. To determine the progress of an image analysis, use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint in Tenable.io Container Security API v2. Returns the status of a job that you specify by ID to determine if the job is still queued, in progress, or has completed.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the job for which you want the status.
parameters.name: job_id

200.description: Returns the status of the job you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.summary: Get job status by image ID
get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. To determine the progress of an image analysis, use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint in Tenable.io Container Security API v2. Returns the status of a job by specifying an image ID to determine if the job is still queued, in progress, or has completed.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the image for which you want the status.
parameters.name: image_id

200.description: Returns the status of the job you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.summary: Get job status by image digest
get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. To determine the progress of an image analysis, use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint in Tenable.io Container Security API v2. Returns the status of a job by specifying an image digest to determine if the job is still queued, in progress, or has completed.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The image digest of the job for which you want the status.
parameters.name: image_digest

200.description: Returns the status of the job you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Checks the compliance of an image that you specify by ID against your policies.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the image that you want to check for policy compliance.
parameters.name: image_id

200.description: Returns an array of compliance results.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Checks the compliance of an image that you specify by name against your policies.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The name of the image for which you want the job status.
parameters.name: image

parameters.description: The name of the repository that hosts the image. By default, this value is library.
parameters.name: repo

parameters.description: The tag for the image that you want to check for policy compliance.
parameters.name: tag

200.description: Returns an array compliance results.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint instead. Returns a report in JSON format for a container that you specify by ID. Note: If you do not have the container_id, you can call the list-containers endpoint.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the container for which you want a report.
parameters.name: container_id

200.description: Returns the report for the container you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint instead. Returns a report in JSON format for an image that you specify by ID. Note: If you do not have the image_id, you can call the list-images endpoint.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the image for which you want a report.
parameters.name: image_id

200.description: Returns the report for the image you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint instead. Returns a report in JSON format for an image digest.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The image digest of the image for which you want a report.
parameters.name: image_digest

200.description: Returns the report for the image you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images/{repository}/{image}/{tag}](/reference#container-security-v2-get-image-report) endpoint instead. Returns a Nessus report for a container that you specify by ID. Note: If you do not have the container_id, you can call the list-containers endpoint.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the container for which you want a report.
parameters.name: id

200.description: Returns the Nessus report for the container you specified.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/repositories](/reference#container-security-v2-list-repositories) endpoint instead. Returns a list of repositories.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The number of items Tenable.io Container Security skips before starting to collect the result set.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Returns an array of repositories.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx

get.description:
**Deprecated!** Tenable.io Container Security API v1 is deprecated. Use the [GET /container-security/api/v2/images](/reference#container-security-v2-list-images) endpoint with the repository filter instead. Returns a list of images inside a specific repository.

Requires BASIC [16] user permissions. See Permissions.

parameters.description: The ID of the relevant repository.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: The number of items to skip before Tenable.io Container Security starts to collect the result set.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Returns an array of images.

401.description: Returns an error message if the request is not authorized.

429.description: Returned if you attempt to send too many requests in a specific period of time. For more information, see [Rate Limiting](/docs/rate-limiting).

response.value:
429 Too Many Requests

nginx
